LanguageData.VGE_OperatorSubpersonaCore.label: operator subpersona core
LanguageData.VGE_OperatorSubpersonaCore.description: A high-grade subcore specialized in gravship combat. It can link with a single gravship artillery piece and control it the same way a crewmember manning a targeting terminal can. It’s combat capabilities are subpar, but it allows for autonomous artillery batteries without the need for human operators.
